INSERT INTO post (
post_id,
user_id, board_id, company_id, post_title, post_content, is_temp ) VALUES (
#{postID},
#{userID}, #{boardID}, #{companyID}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{isTemp} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE board_id=#{boardID}, post_title=#{postTitle}, post_content=#{postContent}, is_temp=#{isTemp};
mapper.select: SELECT post_id as postID, user_id as userID, board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, post_title as postTitle, post_content as postContent, post_register_time as postRegisterTime FROM Post WHERE post_id=#{postID};

SELECT post.post_id as postID, post.user_id as userID, post.board_id as boardID, post.company_id as companyID, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_content as postContent, post.post_register_time as postRegisterTime, board.board_name as boardName, users.user_name as userName FROM Post post, Board board, Users users WHERE (users.user_id = post.user_id AND board.board_id = post.board_id)
ORDER BY postRegisterTime DESC;

SELECT post_id as postID, user_id as userID, board_id as boardID, company_id as companyID, post_title as postTitle, post_content as postContent, post_register_time as postRegisterTime, is_temp as isTemp FROM Post WHERE user_id=#{userID} AND company_id=#{companyID} AND is_temp = true ORDER BY postRegisterTime DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT post.post_id as postID, post.user_id as userID, post.board_id as boardID, post.company_id as companyID, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_content as postContent, post.post_register_time as postRegisterTime, post.is_temp as isTemp, users.user_name as userName FROM Post post, Users users WHERE post.user_id=#{userID} AND post.user_id=users.user_id AND post.company_id=#{companyID} AND post.is_temp = true ORDER BY postRegisterTime DESC;
